ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We thank Stefanie Vink and Xiu Jia for field and technical support. We also thank Nelly D. Eck, Jolanda K Brons, Lennart van Ijzerloo, and J.J. Hogendorf for technical assistance. We are grateful to Ruth Howison for inundation frequency and successional stage data. We thank the Laboratory of Microbial Ecology of the INRAE-CNRS-Université Lyon for the PDA analysis. We acknowledge the “Nederlandse Vereniging voor Natuurmonumenten” for granting us access to the salt marsh. We would like to thank the Center for Information Technology of the University of Groningen for their support and for providing access to the Peregrine high-performance computing cluster.
